name: 陳心怡
objective: This course provides an overview of computer-mediated communication (CMC) and its implications in language education. This course aims to explore theoretical and practical issues associated with CMC technologies and the effects of synchronous and asynchronous CMC technologies on learners’ language use and learning.
scorePolicy:
A total of 100 points will be granted. Your grade will be based on the quality of your work in the following areas. 

1. Attendance, participation in discussions and assignments (20%) 
2. Discussion Leads (20%)
3. Research design (20%)
4. Final Project and Presentation (40%)
